code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import'./App.css';import allActions from'./actions';var App=function App(){var counter=useSelector(function(state){return state.counter;});var currentUser=useSelector(function(state){return state.currentUser;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var user={name:"Rei"};useEffect(function(){dispatch(allActions.userActions.setUser(user));},[]);return React.createElement("div",{className:"App"},currentUser.loggedIn?React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("h1",null,"Hello, ",currentUser.user.name),React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(allActions.userActions.logOut());}},"Logout")):React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("h1",null,"Login"),React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(allActions.userActions.setUser(user));}},"Login as Rei")),React.createElement("h1",null,"Counter: ",counter),React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(allActions.counterActions.increment());}},"Increase Counter"),React.createElement("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(allActions.counterActions.decrement());}},"Decrease Counter"));};export default App;
